dataAttributes.description: 'Data attributes' (commonly referenced with the parameter 'dataAttributes' or derivates), are an object. Every keys of the main object is an object that defines the 'type', 'description', 'definition', 'UoM', 'UoMSymbol' and 'UoMDefinition'

additionalProperties.description: Definition of a key in the objects of the array. In practice is the definition of tha column in the table

definition.description: URI of the definition of the variable, e.g. QUDT URI

UoM.description: Description of the units of measurement

UoMSymbol.description: Simbol of the units of measurement

UoMDefinition.description: URI of the definition of the units or measurement, e.g. QUDT URI
